channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17613] remove object pools for short, same-thread allocations
item.description:
Objects pools probably don't have much effect in this case.
They are only useful when allocations are shared between threads.
item.summary: remove object pools for short, same-thread allocations

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

gopalv can you take a look? A small patch
sershe: Yes, I have a build which is going through perf runs right now.
Committed to master. Thanks for the review!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
